column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I went here on a first date
column2: and we ordered a pitcher of the passion fruit sangrias. He had been there about 4 times
column3: and being new to the area
column4: I gave minimal input. They have something for everyone so you really can't go wrong. Everything we ordered was delicious
column7: and the deviled egg (which you must get even if you don't like eggs
column8: TRUST me on this one because anything with bacon on it has to be good) it was delicious.
